description: A seemingly harmless elderly man selling food and drinks in a small outdoor kiosk, which http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] frequents and to whom he typically pours out all his `sorrows` while downing glasses of shochu. http://anidb.net/ch17450 [Kozenigata] insists on calling the shochu `Kamiyu` aka Camus, and addressing the kiosk operator as `Master`, the Japanese term for bar-tender in a higher class pub.
name: Omohide Sake no Oyaji
